title: f the value of the relief sought is $10,000 or less, at your request, eBay will pay arbitration fees.

tosdr.case: [Good]  If the value of the relief sought is $10,000 or less, at your request, eBay will pay all filing, administration, and arbitrator fees associated with the arbitration.-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Good]  If the value of the relief sought is $10,000 or less, at your request, eBay will pay all filing, administration, and arbitrator fees associated with the arbitration.
